15.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901

HUSR_HOFF_CODE <> GNRL_HOFF_CODE

since last export/import after CTL crash

uses for BXA002, not for BXA050
11.11.2005 BT SCR9091 changed selection radiobutton (change control)
02.05.2005 SH SCR8248 Changed text "Debtor number" to "Debtor number Heller"
4.1.2005 WJ SCR7618 change GNRL_ACTIVEDATE for Date()
24.11.2004 SH SCR7372 Added new button "Additional clients"
31.08.2004 SH SCR6764 Added new fields "Debtor number" and "Debtor name" and if
"Debtor name" entered, uses number as arguments for BXA002A and BXA050.
23.08.2004 MW SCR#6866 --> intially "Archive only"-Radio Button

- or PI.NUMBERCHARGED for BXA002A depented from v.CHARGED

23.09.2003 BT Shortcut- Handling
31.03.2003 RR SCR3246 Current or previous working-date is allowed for v.DATE

network-printer is selected.
17.02.2003 SH SCR2935 Added new checkbox "only not financed" and add
- this to argumentlist for BXA002A
27.01.2003 SH SCR2782 If an error occured after pressing button 'OK' no XML has
- to be produced. Disabled programstart for BXA050 and BXA002 if errors were
- made during entering data on screen
23.01.2003 JJ implemented new authorization/screen title concept
04.12.2002 SCR2651 SH Add new choice control "Print on network printer" to group
- "Delivery" and add new argument PI.PRINTERQUEUE=HUSR_PRINTERQUEUE for BXA002A
//10-10-2002 JP SCR #2334 add validation for email address
08.10.2002 SH Solved problems with arguments for BXA050A
02.10.2002 SH Changed 17. argument of call to BXA050A from numeric to alpha
24.07.2002 SCR1686 SH Changed the radiobuttons in group "Selection"
- to checkboxes (multiple selections possible)
03.06.2002 SH SCR1356 The argument 13, if BXA002 will be called was send as
- numeric, it has to be alphanumeric if BXA002 will be called as SUBMIT-Serverjo
07.05.2002 SH SCR1056 If ASCII or XML and EMAIL or FTP was selected the message:
- 'For report type "File" only delevery "Email" and "FTP" are allowed' occurs.
I modified the CND for this message in the Task 'Event Handler'.
02.04.2002 SH SCR1056 Split ReportType File into ASCII and XML and changed
- argument PI.FILE if BXA050A will be called (A=ASCII, X=XML)
02.04.2002 JJ SCR1050 changed calls BXA002A/BXA050A to use GB701
-changed calls ro message box which were calling a backup

enter emailadress or faxnumber -> chose the delivery typ (SCR #329)
FTP allowed
-- Reset all other fields in group "Selection" if "All invoices" was selected

ExpSyntax.val: {0,10}<>0 AND NOT ({0,17}) AND KbGet (1)<>'Exit'EVENT AND LastClicked ()<>'Button_Cancel'
{0,22}>{0,21} AND KbGet (1)<>'Exit'EVENT AND LastClicked ()<>'Button_Cancel' OR {0,22}<>{0,21} AND {0,22}<>{1,27} AND KbGet (1)<>'Exit'EVENT AND LastClicked ()<>'Button_Cancel'

Text.val: Do something in the Parent Task, to recognize something changed
Ok pressed
-- If checkbox "All invoices" in group "Selection" was selected all other
-- virtuals in this group have be reseted
-- If checkbox "Only financed invoices" in group "Selection" was selected
-- the following selections have to be reseted
-- If checkbox "Only not financed invoices" in group "Selection" was selected
-- the following selections have to be reseted
Messages if something wrong
Report type = file -> only email or ftp (SCR #329)
BXA050 if Report_type=File
-- Call BXA050 for selecetd client on MAIN SCREEN
-- Call BXA050 for the additional entered clients
BXA002 one parameter left
-- Call BXA002 for selecetd client on MAIN SCREEN
24.04.2006 CO SCR10993: changed parameter 27: Printer-Queue:
-- Call BXA002 for selecetd client on MAIN SCREEN
-- Call BXA002 for the additional entered clients
-- Give user message that all BXA jobs are finished/submitted
After creating XML-File leave the screen (SCR #329)
BXA050 if Report_type=File
BXA002 one parameter left
24.04.2006 CO SCR10993: changed parameter 27: Printer-Queue:
-- Validations
.. client already entered on "MAIN SCREEN"
.. client already entered on current screen?
.. entered client does not exist
